sense.def:
A freak
imenujemo človeka, kadar so njegovo vedênje ali navade nenavadne ali kadar je na določen način telesno nenormalen.

seg.quote: A woman is considered a freak if she puts her career first.

sense.def:
Dogodek ali dejanje, ki je
freak
, je nenavadno ali ni verjetno, da se bo uresničilo.

seg.quote: My mother died in a freak accident, struck by lightning at a picnic.
